titleStmt.title: A discourse of the happy union of the kingdoms of England & Scotland dedicated in private to King James I / by Francis Lord Bacon.
Briefe discourse touching the happie union of the kingdomes of England and Scotland
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

titleStmt.title: A discourse of the happy union of the kingdoms of England & Scotland dedicated in private to King James I / by Francis Lord Bacon.
Briefe discourse touching the happie union of the kingdomes of England and Scotland
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Milbourn, and sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Gibson describes A1 as blank; in this copy it has half-title: Articles touching the union of England and Scotland. cf. Gibson, R.W. Francis Bacon 67.
First published (1603) as A briefe discovrse, tovching the happie vnion.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
